name: Frost Ornament
description:
(This game is a prototype.)

Cirno puzzle action game!
Cirno gets lost in the dream. Let's overcome the mysterious stage with the strongest power!

Updates

2019/09/12：Updated to version 0.01a. Bug fixes and some gamepads can now be set.

Controls

Left and Right Key:Move

Z key(or Up + Z key):Ice Shot / Decide

Z > Z:Ice Make

X Key:Broken / Cancel

Q Key:Qucik Retry

Esc:Pause

Credit

Program, Graphic, BGM, SE, etc
